name: Miabella 1/4 CT TDW Flower-Shaped Diamond Ring in Sterling Silver

reviews.name: Miabella 1/4 CT TDW Flower-Shaped Diamond Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: my boyfriend got me this ring and i absolutely love it!! the picture actually doesn't do it much justice. i wanted a ring that was simple and wasn't too big to get caught on things but still pretty, this ring met all of these things. it doesn't stand too high on my finger, the flower style is simple and gorgeous at the same time.i think this was a great deal for the amount of diamonds that are in the ring too. the diamonds are bright and sparkle.
reviews.title: Love It!!

reviews.name: Miabella 1/4 CT TDW Flower-Shaped Diamond Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.title: Great ring !! It's small, but, the price is also..

reviews.name: Miabella 1/4 CT TDW Flower-Shaped Diamond Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: This ring is small. I am a size 5 and have very small hands so its not that bad on me. I recommend this ring for smaller hands. It is very pretty and has a pretty little sparkle. Just know it is a very small ring. :-/
reviews.title: pretty recommend for petite hands

reviews.name: Miabella 1/4 CT TDW Flower-Shaped Diamond Ring in Sterling Silver
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this ring because it matched a gorgeous set of earrings I bought my niece for her 18th Birthday, this would be for her 21st. I was sssooo excited to get it. Until I opened it. I think I almost cried. The shank was so thin I would be afraid for her to grab anything. The setting, although very cute, was small in itself but so small it was hard to tell there were 3 separate "flowers". In a case like this I think I would be fair to show it next to a coin, or on a hand because the picture is quite misleading. Ok...I paid $60 for it, but even at that it wasn't worth it. I definitely returned it on the spot #site to store perk!#. It would be perfect for a young girl maybe 7-10yr range but certainly not for a woman. Will it prevent me from shopping Walmart online or in store..NO WAY..I'll always be a customer.
reviews.title: You definitely get what you pay for.
